headline: Does Expedia (EXPE) Using AI Chat Interfaces Signal a Durable Edge in Online Travel Distribution?
summary: In recent months, research on Expedia Group has highlighted improving room night growth, more efficient marketing, and CEO Ariane Gorin’s shift toward strengthening the B2B business following platform and loyalty program adjustments begun in 2024. At the same time, Expedia’s integration into OpenAI’s ChatGPT apps for trip booking underscores how AI-driven consumer interfaces could deepen user engagement and reinforce its competitive position. Next, we’ll examine how Expedia’s improved...
